custom-sql.sql: SELECT opencps_templatefile.* FROM opencps_templatefile WHERE (groupId = ?) AND ((lower(opencps_templatefile.fileName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_templatefile.fileNo) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]))

SELECT count(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM opencps_templatefile WHERE (groupId = ?) AND ((lower(opencps_templatefile.fileName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_templatefile.fileNo) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]))

SELECT opencps_serviceinfo.* FROM opencps_serviceinfo WHERE groupId = ? AND ( (lower(opencps_serviceinfo.serviceName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_serviceinfo.fullName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) AND (opencps_serviceinfo.administrationCode = ?) AND (opencps_serviceinfo.domainCode = ?)

SELECT count(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM opencps_serviceinfo WHERE groupId = ? AND ( (lower(opencps_serviceinfo.serviceName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_serviceinfo.fullName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) AND (opencps_serviceinfo.administrationCode = ?) AND (opencps_serviceinfo.domainCode = ?)
